name: mystem
description: Node.js wrapper for `MyStem` morphology text analyzer by Yandex.ru

scripts.postinstall: curl http://download.yandex.ru/mystem/mystem-2.0-macosx10.5.tar.gz > mystem.tar.gz && tar -xvf mystem.tar.gz && mkdir -p vendor/darwin/x64 && mv mystem vendor/darwin/x64 && rm mystem.tar.gz

author: Oleg Lebedev
